name: Batman Forever
description:
Batman Forever is an action, arcade and fighting game developed by Acclaim Cheltenham and Probe Entertainment. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Acclaim Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Batman Forever is available on SNES, Game Gear, PC and Game Boy.
It was produced by Darrin Stubbington, David Dienstbier and Jeff Spangenberg. Bey Bickerton, David Dienstbier, Jeff Spangenberg and Jools Watsham directed the game. It was scored by Jools Watsham, Marc Schaefgen and Rick Fox.
